page.title: 08LIVING LICKEY/CATSHILL
page.content: (continued) We conducted a small survey to obtain this information. Most people are satisfied with the life they lead. Many people have two{cars}.Some of the most popular cars are Ford Escorts, Austin Metros and Ford Sierras. A lot of people don't get much{spare {time }but when they do they decorate, sew,read or take courses at college. The most popular domestic {pets }are cats, dogs, rabbits and goldfish. Most people go {shopping }once a week and spend an average amount of Â£50_ Â£55.But others prefer to go once a month and spend about Â£125. Children 7_9 years have about 50p {pocket money }. People are satisfied with the amount of {Family Allowance }and it is usually spent on shopping.
